Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays at Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays at Kimball.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Cicero.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
